amendment.description: To expand eligibility for mental health services from the Department of Veterans Affairs to include members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1968 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1968 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184) To expand eligibility for mental health services from the Department of Veterans Affairs to include members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1968 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1968 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
